trans-unit.source: This topic and its sub-topics provides the JSON format that is supported by the older versions of Azure PowerShell.
trans-unit.target: This topic and its sub-topics provides the JSON format that is supported by the older versions of Azure PowerShell.

trans-unit.source: If you are using the July 2015 Release version of Azure PowerShell or later, see <link xlink:href="03f459ba-403e-4096-9cb5-eb381804ca92" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">HDInsight Hive Activity</link>, <link xlink:href="dff0bbe9-5bf7-43b3-97e4-4a552b8f365a" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">HDInsight Pig Activity</link>, <link xlink:href="5f899b93-bb69-491d-a33b-509956a1fd1a" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">HDInsight MapReduce Activity</link>, <link xlink:href="1a5c0e64-7377-4845-928d-81043ecd485c" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">HDInsight Hadoop Streaming Activity</link> for the latest JSON format.
trans-unit.target: If you are using the July 2015 Release version of Azure PowerShell or later, see <link xlink:href="03f459ba-403e-4096-9cb5-eb381804ca92" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">HDInsight Hive Activity</link>, <link xlink:href="dff0bbe9-5bf7-43b3-97e4-4a552b8f365a" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">HDInsight Pig Activity</link>, <link xlink:href="5f899b93-bb69-491d-a33b-509956a1fd1a" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">HDInsight MapReduce Activity</link>, <link xlink:href="1a5c0e64-7377-4845-928d-81043ecd485c" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">HDInsight Hadoop Streaming Activity</link> for the latest JSON format.

trans-unit.source: You can convert the JSON from old format to new format by using the tool: <externalLink><linkText>JSON Upgrade Tool</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=618507</linkUri></externalLink>
trans-unit.target: You can convert the JSON from old format to new format by using the tool: <externalLink><linkText>JSON Upgrade Tool</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=618507</linkUri></externalLink>

trans-unit.source: When you set the type of activity to <embeddedLabel>HDInsightActivity</embeddedLabel> in a pipeline JSON defintion, you need to the following:
trans-unit.target: When you set the type of activity to <embeddedLabel>HDInsightActivity</embeddedLabel> in a pipeline JSON defintion, you need to the following:

trans-unit.source: Specify a <embeddedLabel>linked service</embeddedLabel> that points to an <embeddedLabel>Azure HDInsight</embeddedLabel> cluster.
trans-unit.target: Specify a <embeddedLabel>linked service</embeddedLabel> that points to an <embeddedLabel>Azure HDInsight</embeddedLabel> cluster.

trans-unit.source: Hive and Pig scripts you specify will run on this cluster.
trans-unit.target: Hive and Pig scripts you specify will run on this cluster.

trans-unit.source: See <link xlink:href="1a66a1b1-a81c-4218-bb8f-faa29daa45df" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">HDInsight BYOC Linked Service</link> and <link xlink:href="68e95b38-743b-46f0-9f40-29203c4bafbd" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">HDInsight On-Demand Linked Service</link> topics for details on HDInsight linked services.
trans-unit.target: See <link xlink:href="1a66a1b1-a81c-4218-bb8f-faa29daa45df" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">HDInsight BYOC Linked Service</link> and <link xlink:href="68e95b38-743b-46f0-9f40-29203c4bafbd" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">HDInsight On-Demand Linked Service</link> topics for details on HDInsight linked services.

trans-unit.source: Set the <embeddedLabel>type</embeddedLabel> or <embeddedLabel>transformation</embeddedLabel> is set to <embeddedLabel>Pig</embeddedLabel> or <embeddedLabel>Hive</embeddedLabel> or <embeddedLabel>MapReduce</embeddedLabel>
trans-unit.target: Set the <embeddedLabel>type</embeddedLabel> or <embeddedLabel>transformation</embeddedLabel> is set to <embeddedLabel>Pig</embeddedLabel> or <embeddedLabel>Hive</embeddedLabel> or <embeddedLabel>MapReduce</embeddedLabel>

trans-unit.source: Specify the Pig/Hive script to be used with the Pig/Hive transformation (or) MapReduce program to be used with te MaoReduce transformation.
trans-unit.target: Specify the Pig/Hive script to be used with the Pig/Hive transformation (or) MapReduce program to be used with te MaoReduce transformation.

trans-unit.source: The administrator of the HDInsight cluster used by the HDInsight activity may be able to access the input and output linked services for the activity.
trans-unit.target: The administrator of the HDInsight cluster used by the HDInsight activity may be able to access the input and output linked services for the activity.

trans-unit.source: The following topics provide syntax and examples for using HDInsight Activity with Hive, Pig, and MapReduce transformations.
trans-unit.target: The following topics provide syntax and examples for using HDInsight Activity with Hive, Pig, and MapReduce transformations.

trans-unit.source: See <externalLink><linkText>Use Pig and Hive with Azure Data Factory</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=517697</linkUri></externalLink> for a walkthrough on creating an Azure data factory that uses HDInsight activity to process data and <externalLink><linkText>Invoke MapReduce Programs from Data Factory</linkText><linkUri>http://azure.microsoft.com/documentation/articles/data-factory-map-reduce/</linkUri></externalLink> topic for details about using the HDInsight Activity with the MapReduce transformation.
trans-unit.target: See <externalLink><linkText>Use Pig and Hive with Azure Data Factory</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=517697</linkUri></externalLink> for a walkthrough on creating an Azure data factory that uses HDInsight activity to process data and <externalLink><linkText>Invoke MapReduce Programs from Data Factory</linkText><linkUri>http://azure.microsoft.com/documentation/articles/data-factory-map-reduce/</linkUri></externalLink> topic for details about using the HDInsight Activity with the MapReduce transformation.
